# authorizationStatus()

**Type Method**

Returns whether the app can access the user’s media library.

## Declaration

```swift
class func authorizationStatus() -> MPMediaLibraryAuthorizationStatus
```

## Return Value

The status representing whether the app has access to the user’s media library.

## Getting the default media library

- **requestAuthorization(_:)**: Displays a user interface so that the user can authorize whether your app may view the media library’s contents.
- **MPMediaLibraryAuthorizationStatus**: The list of possible states for authorization to access to the user’s media library.
- **default()**: Returns an instance of the default media library.
